name: Junior SPMAT Specialist
description:
Responsibilities:
  • To upload & maintain MMDB (Material Management Database) updated in accordance to all PLs/PNs received from Traffic team;
  • To upload & maintain SPMat updated in accordance to Structural Steel Packing Lists (Packing Notes) received from Easy Structure;
  • To revise Spooled Isos BOM in SPMat according to Revised Spooled Isos Drawings received from Yards/Site Field Engineering;
  • Follow up on SPMat Release Notes creation (& create RNs when necessary) in order to ensure all materials have proper MRR once received & inspected on Yards/Site;
  • To support on uploading and maintaining SPMat & MMDB updated with COW Materials in SPMat (Carry Over Work materials shipped from Yards to Site);
  • To support Project SPMat Coordinator on any additional task required along assignment.
Requirements:
  • University Degree preferably with a technical/ civil construction major
  • Experience of Entering the construction/material activities data
  • Experience in construction/material flow data maintenance
  • Excellent computer skills (MS Office advanced user)
  • Fluent English
Conditions:
  • Position is in Moscow office of a General Contractor of Arctic LNG2 Project
  • 5/2, 09:00-18:00 working day
  • Fixed term contract: 2 years extendable
  • 100 % official employment and salary
  • Private medical insurance
  • Multicultural professional team
